mapper.sql: u.ID, u.loginName, u.password, u.salt, u.name, u.niName, u.sex, u.personNo, u.daXue, u.daXue_address, u.home_address, u.stu_number, u.daxue_zhuanye, u.shixun_zhuanye, u.peixun_zhuanye, u.phone1, u.phone2, u.photo, u.QQ, u.weixin, u.email, u.user_type, u.kaoqin_code, u.kaoqin_ruleID, u.status, u.create_time, u.create_by, u.update_time, u.update_by, u.last_logintime, u.loat_longin_ip, u.remarks, u.is_del, u.sort, u.grade, u.cut_grade, u.col_3
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM user_office uo LEFT JOIN `user` u ON uo.user_id = u.ID WHERE uo.office_id = #{id} AND u.user_type=4 AND uo.is_del=1 AND u.is_del=1;

select
distinct
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user (ID, loginName, password, salt, name, niName, sex, personNo, daXue, daXue_address, home_address, stu_number, daxue_zhuanye, shixun_zhuanye, peixun_zhuanye, phone1, phone2, photo, QQ, weixin, email, user_type, kaoqin_code, kaoqin_ruleID, status, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, last_logintime, loat_longin_ip, remarks, is_del, sort, grade, cut_grade, col_3) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{niname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{personno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daxue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daxueAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daxueZhuanye,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shixunZhuanye,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peixunZhuanye,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kaoqinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kaoqinRuleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loatLonginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cutGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{col3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select:
SELECT
from user u WHERE u.id NOT in( ( select us.id from user us JOIN user_office uo on us.id =uo.user_id JOIN office f on uo.office_id =f.id where f.office_type = 3 and us.is_del=1 and f.is_del= 1 and uo.is_del=1)) and us.kaoqin_ruleID is null and u.is_del=0 AND u.user_type = 4;

SELECT
FROM user u JOIN user_office uo ON u.ID = uo.user_id WHERE uo.office_id = #{id} AND u.user_type=4 AND u.kaoqin_ruleID IS NULL ;

SELECT
FROM user u WHERE ID IN ( SELECT uo.user_id FROM user_office uo LEFT JOIN kaoqin_result kr ON kr.user_id=uo.user_id WHERE kr.status=0 AND uo.office_id = #{id} AND kr.is_del=1 AND uo.is_del=1 )AND is_del=1 AND u.user_type=4;

SELECT
FROM user u WHERE ID IN ( SELECT uo.user_id FROM user_office uo LEFT JOIN kaoqin_result kr ON kr.user_id = uo.user_id WHERE (kr.kaoqin_remark_type=1 AND kr.kaoqin_remark_status ) OR kr.kaoqin_shenshu_status is not null AND uo.office_id = #{id} AND kr.is_del=1) AND is_del=1 AND u.user_type=4;

SELECT
FROM user u join user_office uo on u.id=uo.user_id join office f on uo.office_id=f.id where f.id=#{office.id} and f.is_del=1 and u.is_del=1 and uo.is_del=1 AND u.user_type=4 and u.id not in (SELECT uu.id FROM user uu join user_office uoo on uu.id=uoo.user_id join office ff on uoo.office_id=ff.id where ff.parent_id=#{office.id} and ff.is_del=1 and uu.is_del=1 and uoo.is_del=1 AND uu.user_type=4)

SELECT
FROM user u join user_office uo on u.id=uo.user_id join office f on uo.office_id=f.id where f.id=#{office.id} and f.is_del=1 and u.is_del=1 and uo.is_del=1 AND u.user_type=4

SELECT
FROM user u join user_office uo on u.id=uo.user_id join office f on uo.office_id=f.id where f.id=#{office.id} and f.is_del=1 and u.is_del=1 and uo.is_del=1 AND u.user_type=4

SELECT
FROM user u join user_office uo on u.id=uo.user_id join office f on uo.office_id=f.id where f.id=#{office.id} and f.is_del=1 and u.is_del=1 and uo.is_del=1 AND u.user_type=4 and u.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= u.create_time and u.id not in( SELECT uu.id FROM user uu join user_office uoo on uu.id=uoo.user_id join office ff on uoo.office_id=ff.id where ff.office_type=3 and ff.is_del=1 and uu.is_del=1 and uoo.is_del=1 AND uu.user_type=4 )

SELECT
FROM user u join user_office uo on u.id=uo.user_id join office f on uo.office_id=f.id where f.id=#{office.id} and f.is_del=1 and u.is_del=1 and uo.is_del=1 AND u.user_type=4 and u.id not in( SELECT uu.id FROM user uu join user_office uoo on uu.id=uoo.user_id join office ff on uoo.office_id=ff.id where ff.office_type=3 and ff.is_del=1 and uu.is_del=1 and uoo.is_del=1 )

SELECT u.ID, loginName, u.password, u.salt, u.name, u.niName, u.sex, u.personNo, u.daXue, u.daXue_address, u.home_address, u.stu_number, u.daxue_zhuanye, u.shixun_zhuanye, u.peixun_zhuanye, u.phone1, u.phone2, u.photo, u.QQ, u.weixin, u.email, u.user_type, u.kaoqin_code, u.kaoqin_ruleID,u.status, u.create_time, u.create_by, u.update_time, u.update_by, u.last_logintime, u.loat_longin_ip, u.remarks, u.is_del, u.sort, u.grade, u.cut_grade, u.col_3 FROM user u join user_office uo on u.id=uo.user_id join office f on uo.office_id=f.id where f.id=#{id} and f.is_del=1 and u.is_del=1 and uo.is_del=1 AND u.user_type=4 and u.kaoqin_code is null

SELECT
FROM user u join user_office uo on u.id=uo.user_id join office f on uo.office_id=f.id where f.id=#{office.id} and f.is_del=1 and u.is_del=1 and uo.is_del=1 AND u.user_type=4 and u.kaoqin_ruleID is not null

SELECT
FROM user u join user_office uo on u.id=uo.user_id join office f on uo.office_id=f.id where u.kaoqin_ruleID=#{kaoqinRule.id} and f.is_del=1 and u.is_del=1 and uo.is_del=1 AND u.user_type=4 and u.id not in ( SELECT uu.id FROM user uu join user_office uoo on uu.id=uoo.user_id join office ff on uoo.office_id=ff.id where ff.office_type=3 and ff.is_del=1 and uu.is_del=1 and uoo.is_del=1 )

SELECT u.ID,u.name,o.ID `groupId` FROM user u JOIN user_office uo ON u.ID=uo.user_id JOIN office o ON uo.office_id=o.ID WHERE o.parent_id = #{office.id} and o.is_del=1 and u.is_del=1 and uo.is_del=1 AND u.user_type=4;
